name: Halloween Challenge
description:
Halloween is coming and also disaster. But there is hope. If you can solve a mathematical challenge, you can avert disaster. The world needs your math skills. Can you solve a Halloween challenge and save Halloween?

The game Halloween Challenge test your imagination and mathematical ability. How many mathematical challenges can you solve?

Try demo at: http://www.halloween.petersekera.eu/

------

Halloween Challenge at https://www.facebook.com/SekipGamesHalloween Challenge at https://twitter.com/SekipGamesHalloween Challenge at https://www.instagram.com/sekip.games/
